# M. S. Mel'gunov et al., Adsorption (2019) 25:601-611.: https://doi.org/10.1007/s10450-019-00055-z
#
# BET surface areas (m2/g) for degassed at various temperatures
# T(deg): 100, 200, 300, 400, 500, 600, 700, 800, 900
# alpha-s(BET):4.7, 4.8, 4.8, 4.8, 5.1, 5.2, 5.1, 5.1, 5.1
# p/ps range: 0.14-0.30, 0.12-0.28, 0.10-0.28, 0.08-0.26, 0.07-0.26, 0.07-0.26, 0.06-0.26, 0.05-0.29, 0.05-0.29
#
# Adsorption of N2 (77.4 K) in cm3/g STP on hydrated alpha-Al2O3 degassed at various temperatures
# ln(p/(Ps-P)), Degas temperature (deg) 100, 200, 300, 400, 500, 600, 700, 800, 900, epsilon=sigma_x/(average(x)*sqet(n)) (%)
